content: the perfect gift for anyone unique stash bursting and extremely fast to crochet crocheted in the round from the bottom up pattern includes instruction for the pocket the whole project can be crocheted in a couple of hours and requires less than a ball of yarn skill level intermediate one size photo tutorial on my instagram profile @crochettolove 1 please do not modify my pattern and resale as your own do not distribute this pattern as your own work in any way 1 https //www instagram com
